races.name: Human
races.description: Balanced and adaptable, humans excel in any class.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Stout and tough, dwarves are natural fighters and priests.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and perceptive, elves excel at magic and stealth.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small but nimble, halflings make excellent thieves and bards.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Clever and willful, gnomes have an affinity for magic.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Strong and resilient, half-orcs are fearsome warriors.
